detail_desc: Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar, small frill trim around the armholes, buttons down the front and ties at the front of the hem.
Double-layered hats in soft, patterned cotton jersey. One with sewn-on ears at the top.
Long-sleeved dress in a fine-knit cotton and wool blend with a hole pattern at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a lace trim at the hem.
Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Wide trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long, loose-fitting T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif. Roll-edge neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, twisted side seams and a raw-edge hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and ties at the cuffs. Unlined.

Jacket in washed denim with a pile collar and press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets, a flap chest pocket with a press-stud, adjustable tabs with press-studs at the sides and press-studs at the cuffs. Pile lining.
Slim-fit, pull-on jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, and front and back pockets.

Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a glittery text print on the front, a jersey-lined hood and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a soft weave with covered elastication at the waist.

V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and a wide, double-layered lower section.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal earrings in various designs decorated with sparkly beads in plastic and glass. One pair with pendants and 24 pairs of studs. Size from 0.2 cm to 2 cm.

Knee-length dress in a patterned weave with dropped shoulders, short flounced sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Concealed zip and  a hook-and-eye fastener at the back, wide skirt with a sewn-in wrapover and decorative flounce and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Double-breasted coat in a felted wool blend with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Strappy tops in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a scalloped trim at the top. Supplied in a printed jersey bag that can be worn as a backpack.
Calf-length, A-line skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and linen weave with a high waist, covered buttons down the front and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Fitted top in organic cotton slub jersey with a V-neck and long sleeves.
5-pocket, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups, wide shoulder straps and a racer back. Elastic hem with a hook-and-eye fastening. Extra firm support.
Oversized pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. T-shirt with narrow ribbing around the neckline and low dropped shoulders. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Oversized cardigan in soft, fine-knit cashmere with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative lace trims, and long raglan sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and cuffs.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a zebra-striped crêpe weave with wide notch lapels and one button at the front. Chest pocket, an inner pocket, flap front pockets, buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip on one side and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Short-sleeved cotton piqué top with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and narrow ribbing at the cuffs.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with jersey-lined, opening cups with removable inserts. Adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Tops in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and long sleeves. Slim fit.

Shirt in soft, lightweight premium cotton flannel with a cutaway collar and French front. Open chest pocket, yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frilled collar and long raglan sleeves with frilled cuffs.
Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lace. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Double-layered headband in a mohair-blend knit with a decorative knot detail at the front.
One necklace in metal with sparkly stones and one with pearly plastic beads. Adjustable length, 29-36 cm and 38-45.5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with embroidered details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Espadrilles in imitation suede with a frill trim at the front and braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

T-shirt dress in hard washed jersey made from a soft viscose and cotton blend with a wide neckline, short sleeves and twisted ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Visible seam centre back and a rounded hem.

Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a round neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Detachable tie belt at the waist and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
Calf-length, A-line dress in an airy weave. V-neck with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulder straps, and covered elastication at the top of the back. Unlined.

Trousers in airy, crinkled chiffon made partly from recycled polyester with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and concealed pockets in the side seams. Low crotch and extra-wide, flared legs. Jersey lining at the top.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and adjustable plastic fastener at the front. Zipped side pockets, flap leg pockets with press-studs and welt back pockets. Low crotch and legs with an elastic drawstring at the hems and a concealed zip at the knees to convert the trousers into shorts.
Sleeveless blouse in crinkled viscose with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frills at the sides. Lace-trimmed gathered seam at the top and an asymmetric hem.
Short top in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a wide, round neckline, short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Shorter-style hoodie in cotton sweatshirt fabric. High collar at the front with a chunky, long zip and a lined hood with a knotted drawstring. Slightly shorter at the front and a vertical seam down the back. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, pattern-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Playsuit in soft jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a decorative bow at the front.
Control-top tights that look like over-the-knee socks and shape the tummy and bum.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with vertical seams and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a beaded motif on the front.
Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a high waist, zip fly and button, discreet pockets in the side seams and gently tapered legs with creases.

Boxy jacket in washed denim with notch lapels, a concealed, diagonal zip down the front and front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an adjustable tab with D-rings at the sides of the hem. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy, washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with decorations. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Shirt in a viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Short shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist with narrow elastication at the back and a gently flared peplum.
Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a wrapover, draped top, long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
Blouse in soft satin with a smocked stand-up collar, opening and buttons at the back, long, wide balloon sleeves, and smocking at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and narrow sides with decorative gathers and rings.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, wide sides with a drawstring and full coverage at the back.

Fitted top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short, voluminous puff sleeves in a cotton weave. Square neckline front and back and elasticated edges over the shoulders and around the sleeves.
Fishnet tights with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in a wool weave with a lightly felted finish and fringes along the short sides. Size 32x180 cm.
Padded gilet in windproof, water repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.
Sandals in imitation leather with a decorative appliqué on the front, ankle strap with a hook and loop tab and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
